!title: Chicken Tikka Masala
!size: 4 servings
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: allrecipes.com (http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Authentic-Chicken-Tikka-Masala)

# 4 tbs yoghurt
# 2 tsp garam marsala
# 2 tsp paprika
# 1/2 tsp black pepper, ground
# 1/2 tsp salt
# 1/2 tsp cayenne
# 1/2 tsp coriander, ground
# 450 g chicken breast
* cut chicken into finger thick strips
* mix and marinade for > 2h

# chicken strips
* roast for 10 min in preheated 230Â°C oven

# 1 tsp cumin seeds
# 3 tbs oil
* roast until aromatic

# 1 onion, chopped
* add, cook until softened

# 3 pcs garlic cloves, minced
# 1 tbs ginger, grated
# 2 pcs green chile peppers, minced
* cook until onion is browned

# 2 pcs tomatos, diced
# 125ml tomato paste
# 125ml water
* cook until tomatos start to break down

# 1 tsp garam marsala
# 1/2 tsp coriander seeds, ground
# 1/2 tsp turmeric, ground
# 250ml heavy cream
# cooked chicken
# salt
* stir in chicken
* let simmer for about 10 minutes
* season if necessary
